Day 1
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/1


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


aoc.elf::aoc_get(1,2015)





input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-01-input.txt"))



— Part 1 —


x <- strsplit(input,"") |> unlist()
sum(x == "(") - sum(x == ")")


[1] 232

— Part 2 —


y <- case_when(x == "(" ~ 1, x == ")" ~ -1, TRUE ~ 0)
which(cumsum(y)==-1)[1]


[1] 1783


Day 2
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/2


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 2, year = 2015)





input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-02-input.txt"))



— Part 1 —


tibble(x = input) |> 
  separate(x, into = c("l","w","h"), sep = "x",convert = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(lw = l * w,
         wh = w * h,
         lh = l * h,
         sf = 2*lw + 2*wh + 2*lh + pmap_dbl(list(lw,wh,lh), ~min(c(...)))
  ) |> 
  pull(sf) |> 
  sum()


[1] 1586300

— Part 2 —


tibble(x = input) |> 
  separate(x, into = c("l","w","h"), sep = "x",convert = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(lw = l + w,
         wh = w + h,
         lh = l + h,
         r = pmap_dbl(list(lw,wh,lh), ~ 2*min(c(...))) + l * w * h
  ) |> 
  pull(r) |> 
  sum()


[1] 3737498


Day 3
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/3


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 3, year = 2015)





input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-03-input.txt")) |>
  strsplit("") |>
  unlist()



— Part 1 —


visit <- function(position,move){
  switch(move,
         ">" = position[1] <- position[1] + 1,
         "<" = position[1] <- position[1] - 1,
         "^" = position[2] <- position[2] + 1,
         "v" = position[2] <- position[2] - 1,
  )
  return(position)
}

purrr::accumulate(input,visit, .init = c(0,0)) |> unique() |> length()


[1] 2565

— Part 2 —
divvy up half to santa and half to robosanta


santa <- input[rep_len(c(TRUE,FALSE),length(input))]
robosanta <- input[rep_len(c(FALSE,TRUE),length(input))]

c(purrr::accumulate(santa,visit, .init = c(0,0)),
  purrr::accumulate(robosanta,visit, .init = c(0,0))) |> 
  unique() |> 
  length()


[1] 2639


Day 4
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/4


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 4, year = 2015)





input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-04-input.txt"))



— Part 1 —


library(digest)

i <- 1

repeat{
  if(i %% 100000 == 0) cat(i,"\n")
  key <- digest::digest(paste0(input,i),algo = "md5", serialize = FALSE)
  if(str_starts(key,"00000")) break
  i <- i+1
}


100000 

— Part 2 —
Hmm. Slow. Switching to vector version, which seems to be supplied as a function factory?


library(digest)

hash <- digest::getVDigest(algo = "md5",errormode = "silent")
v <- hash(paste0(input,1:4000000),serialize = FALSE)
min(which(str_starts(v,"000000")))


[1] 3938038


Day 5
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/5


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 5, year = 2015)





input <- readLines(here::here("2015/day-05-input.txt"))



— Part 1 —


x <- input[!stringr::str_detect(input,"ab|cd|pq|xy")]

y <- x[strsplit(x,"") |> map_dbl(~sum(.x %in% c("a","e","i","o","u"))) >= 3]

z <- y[map_lgl(strsplit(y,""),~any(rle(.x)$lengths>=2))]

length(z)


[1] 258

— Part 2 —


a <- input[strsplit(input,"") |> map_lgl(~any(lead(.x,n = 2,default = "")==.x))]

pairchecker <- function(s){
  ss <- strsplit(s,"") |> unlist()
  ss <- paste0(ss,lead(ss, default = "1"))
  
  any(map_lgl(ss, 
              ~str_replace(string = s,pattern = .x,replacement = "2") |>
                str_detect(pattern = .x)))
}

b <- a[map_lgl(a,pairchecker)]

length(b)


[1] 53


Day 6
https://adventofcode.com/2015/day/6


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(glue)
  
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
})

options(scipen = 9999999)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)



— Data —


# tanho63/aoc.elf
aoc.elf::aoc_get(day = 6, year = 2015)





input <- tibble(x = readLines(here::here("2015/day-06-input.txt"))) |> 
  extract(x, into = c("action","x1","y1","x2","y2"),
          regex = "([a-z, ]+) ([0-9]+),([0-9]+) through ([0-9]+),([0-9]+)",
          convert = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(
    id = row_number(),
    .before = 1
  )



— Part 1 —


lights <- matrix(-1,nrow = 1000, ncol = 1000)

instructions <- input |> 
  mutate(
    references = pmap(list(x1,y1,x2,y2),
                      ~crossing(y = ..2:..4,
                                x = ..1:..3) |> 
                        as.matrix())
  )

for(i in instructions$id){
  switch(instructions$action[i],
         "turn on" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- 1,
         "turn off" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- -1,
         "toggle" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- lights[instructions$references[[i]]] * -1
         )
}

sum(lights == 1)


[1] 377891

— Part 2 —


lights <- matrix(0,nrow = 1000, ncol = 1000)

instructions <- input |> 
  mutate(
    references = pmap(list(x1,y1,x2,y2),
                      ~crossing(y = ..2:..4,
                                x = ..1:..3) |> 
                        as.matrix())
  )

for(i in instructions$id){
  switch(instructions$action[i],
         "turn on" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- lights[instructions$references[[i]]] + 1,
         "turn off" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- lights[instructions$references[[i]]] -1,
         "toggle" = lights[instructions$references[[i]]] <- lights[instructions$references[[i]]] + 2
         )
  
  lights[lights < 0] <- 0
}

sum(lights)


[1] 14110788
